metadata.synopsis: Astarion at the Epilogue party. Bat Behaviour

0.speaker: Astarion
0.text: I should take a tour. Just to see what the rest are up to.
0.context: NodeContext: Vampire Lord - About to turn into a bat and fly around the camp, spying on people

1.speaker: Astarion
1.text: Just the same old chatter. Does no one here get drunk and spill secrets?
1.context: NodeContext: Vampire Lord - Just turned from a bat back to a person after flying around the camp, eavesdropping on people

2.speaker: Astarion
2.text: Not one juicy secret to be heard. Such a pity.
2.context: NodeContext: Vampire Lord - Just turned from a bat back to a person after flying around the camp, eavesdropping on people

3.speaker: Astarion
3.text: Perhaps I should stretch my wings again. Who knows what people are gossiping about.
3.context: NodeContext: Vampire Lord - About to turn into a bat and fly around the camp, spying on people
